attributes.action: For all schools to stay of untill corona viruse is completely clear
attributes.additional_details: So kids can carry it from school cos there is so many kids there that is is just ridiculous because it is spreading a lot faster since schools reopend
attributes.background: Shut schools across the uk untill corona virus is completely clear

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Keep schools closed until Covid 19 is no longer a threat: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/316404

Reclose schools and colleges due to increase in COVID-19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846
